statements: SELECT id, location, natural_light_intensity, lighting_intensity, automated_adjustment FROM lighting_control;
SELECT location, lighting_intensity, natural_light_intensity, id, automated_adjustment FROM lighting_control;
SELECT * FROM lighting_control WHERE automated_adjustment = TRUE;
SELECT location, natural_light_intensity FROM lighting_control WHERE lighting_intensity > 50;
SELECT id, location FROM lighting_control WHERE natural_light_intensity < 30;
SELECT * FROM lighting_control WHERE location = 'Office' ORDER BY natural_light_intensity DESC, lighting_intensity ASC
SELECT id, location, natural_light_intensity FROM lighting_control WHERE automated_adjustment = TRUE ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT location, lighting_intensity FROM lighting_control WHERE natural_light_intensity > 500 AND lighting_intensity < 1000
SELECT * FROM lighting_control ORDER BY automated_adjustment DESC, location ASC
SELECT id, location FROM lighting_control WHERE location LIKE '%Room%' AND automated_adjustment = FALSE ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT id, date, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 60;
SELECT light_zone, light_intensity FROM LightingControl ORDER BY light_intensity ASC;
SELECT * FROM LightingControl WHERE auto_adjust = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 20 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT id, light_zone, light_intensity FROM LightingControl WHERE auto_adjust = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY temperature ASC, humidity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM LightingControl WHERE temperature_threshold >= 23 AND light_zone = 1 ORDER BY light_intensity DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY city_name DESC;
SELECT city_name, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT * FROM lighting_control WHERE light_intensity < 50;
SELECT city_name, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, ambient_light FROM sensor_data ORDER BY ambient_light ASC;
SELECT city_name, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 80 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE uv_index BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT control_id, automated FROM lighting_control WHERE light_intensity < 50
SELECT city_name, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE ambient_light > 100 ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM WeatherData LIMIT 5;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY humidity DESC;
SELECT id, light_intensity, location FROM LightSensorData WHERE location='Living Room';
SELECT adjustment_id, brightness_level, time_adjusted FROM AdjustedLighting ORDER BY time_adjusted DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT weather_id, light_id FROM WeatherLightingMapping WHERE weather_id = 1;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY humidity DESC;
SELECT id, light_intensity, location FROM LightSensorData WHERE light_intensity < 500 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, adjustment_id, brightness_level, time_adjusted FROM AdjustedLighting WHERE time_adjusted BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY brightness_level DESC;

SELECT wl.id, wd.temperature, ls.location FROM WeatherLightingMapping wl JOIN WeatherData wd ON wl.weather_id = wd.id JOIN LightSensorData ls ON wl.light_id = ls.id ORDER BY wd.temperature ASC, ls.location DESC;

SELECT wd.id, wd.temperature, ls.light_intensity FROM WeatherData wd JOIN LightSensorData ls ON wd.id = ls.id WHERE wd.temperature < 20 AND ls.light_intensity > 800 ORDER BY wd.temperature ASC, ls.light_intensity DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData;
SELECT weather_id, date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData;
SELECT temperature, date, humidity, weather_id FROM WeatherData;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT date, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT weather_id, date, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT date, humidity, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity >= 60 AND temperature < 20 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT weather_id, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 15 AND 30 ORDER BY weather_id DESC
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
